author: James Joyce
text: Dear Colm I saw Mr Boon yesterday in London. He took the MS (or rather the sheets) and said he will write to me on the matter in about ten days. Lynd, however, is not his reader. I hope he will take it on but I doubt it. He read my letter in Sinn FÃ©in and said he would not care to publish the passage about Edward VII. Thanks all the same. I shall not fail to let you know how I fare. Sincerely yours James Joyce
